item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello and welcome to the Flaunting Firefly Group. You are probably here as we left a kind note on your desktop for you! Remember to pay your fees before the deadline so that your files are not encrypted with our state-of-the-art Caesar Cipher. Please note that is site is just a demonstration for an ethical hacking capture the flag event.
